author: Obi-Wan3
install_msg:
Thanks for installing!
If you have any suggestions, or found any bugs, feel free to create an issue on my repo at https://github.com/Obi-Wan3/OB13-Cogs or contact me in Red's 3rd-party Cog Support server at https://discord.gg/GET4DVk.
name: OB13-Cogs
short: Assorted Utility Cogs for Red v3
description: Assorted utility cogs for Red v3: custom emoji management, free translations, public/private VC system creation, custom bot mentionhelp, and more!
